body:
Comment 4: 
If you get me a self-contained client & server repro I will prioritize fixing this, but
it's not even obvious what the problem is.

Using a custom dialer and custom net.Conns that mess with read timeouts at least gives
me an excuse to point the blame finger at you, but I'm perfectly willing to believe it's
my fault too, but I'm not sure exactly what to look for.  I have enough free time at the
moment to fix something, but not to investigate.
